string.name: aboutus
string.br: This app is the module of the solution we have devised.
At the incident of patient’s emergency ,when the SOS button in the app is pressed.
The SOS signal containing the victim’s GPS coordinates is sent to the Firebase Server which is retrieved by the drone.

The drone after receiving the SOS signal flies towards the victim’s coordinates with medical supplies . This app should be installed in the victim’s mobile phone and should be used only in the case of emergency.
